(4) Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

(4) Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.

Dark Ranger General's Bodice

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 2,191 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
(4) Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!
Set: Soul Cleave deals 10% increased damage and has a 25% chance to shatter 1 Lesser Soul fragments from a target it hits.
(4) Set: Consuming a Soul Fragment increases the damage and healing of your next Fel Devastation by 2%, up to 30%.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.2 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 2,987 Haste for 12 sec.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Agility by 2,029, up to 10,145.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.1 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
